price: (276) Allāh destroys interest and gives increase for charities. And Allāh does not like every sinning disbeliever.
arabic: يَمۡحَقُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّبَوٰاْ وَيُرۡبِي ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yamḥaqu al-lahu al-riba wayur'bī al-ṣadaqāti wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu kulla kaffārin athīmin
